skillTree.localised_description: Skeletal Steeds draped in fine armour make for an impressive and dangerous sight.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
When two or more units in the same army share this attribute,  intensity increases the power of spells cast.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: "To me, my winged steed of bone and flesh; let us fly and remake the world together!"

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can fly.
When two or more units in the same army share this attribute,  intensity increases the power of spells cast.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

skillTree.localised_description: The unholy combination of warp-tech, cathayan engineering and absolute insanity has created an unstable instrument of death.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit is always flying and cannot land.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
When two or more units in the same army share this attribute,  intensity increases the power of spells cast.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

ui_effects.localised_text: Enemies hit by necro-lightning strikes in melee combat

skillTree.localised_description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: A wave of congealed darkness steals the heat from all it hits and feeds on life force itself.

effects.description: Winds of magic cost: -2 to "Wave of Darkness"

skillTree.localised_description: A bolt of eldritch darkness less complex then those found in Naggaroth.

effects.description: Winds of magic cost: -2 to "Lesser Doombolt"
Winds of magic cost: -2 to "Lesser Doombolt Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Power of Darkness"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Word of Pain"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Word of Pain Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Word of Pain Upgraded"

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Ancestral Warriors
Summons a unit of Ancestral Warriors

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Ancestral Warriors"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Ancestral Warriors Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Ancestral Warriors Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: A leader of the dead, literally, they are of the dead and leading.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: A solid shield of darkness may protect the Wight, sword, spear, spell and arrow be turned aside.
Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Glory in your dark majesty, my lord."
Vampires and their liche-servants are devious creatures; manipulative with many mortal servants in their thrall.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%
	(Heroes in local province)

Hero action success chance: +5%
	(Heroes in local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "They will tremble, my lord, oh, they will fear!"

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Once forbidden knowledge is acquired, Necromancers and Vampires will jealously guard it from rivals' eyes.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(own army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A master indeed - to rival the Great Necromancer himself?

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -10% for all spellcasters
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Evil-minded, poisonous malignancy. For its own sake.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
Behind every thought they have - and every deed - is shameless, full-blooded spite.
